title: In photos: The scene following a deadly collision of trains in India
description: At least 120 people were killed and more than 800 injured in a train collision in eastern India on Friday, official told local media outlets — figures expected to climb. After the accident, many people remain trapped inside train cars and under the wreckage.

title: U.S. informant sentenced to life in assassination of Haitian president
description: Rodolphe Jaar, a convicted drug trafficker, is the first to be convicted and sentenced in the assassination plot.

title: Jordan’s royal wedding: A glamorous diversion from the kingdom’s woes
description: At the heart of the ceremony was a well-crafted message: This young, royal couple represent the bright future of Jordan.

title: Three-train collision in India leaves at least 50 dead, hundreds injured
description: A train derailed in the Indian state of Odisha, sending some cars careening onto the opposite track, according to local media reports.

title: Scenes of violent protests in Dakar
description: Demonstrators in Senegal's capital set cars on fire and threw rocks at police. Police fired tear gas on the crowds.

title: Biden isn’t the only politician to fall: Why we can’t look away
description: President Biden joins a long list of leaders from Xi Jinping to Vladimir Putin whose falls made the news. Why do we care so much when the mighty fall?

title: China’s quandary: Bail out debt-laden cities, or risk disruptive defaults?
description: Across China, local governments are struggling under a $23 trillion pile of debt. Beijing doesn't want to rescue them, but it also doesn't want them failing.

title: A Canadian bakery was burglarized. The thief later called to apologize.
description: A man broke into Sweet Something, a Vancouver pastry shop, on May 26. A few days later, he apologized to the owner and offered to pay for the repairs.

title: U.S. rebuffs cease-fire calls in strategy for Ukraine resilience
description: Antony Blinken also described what he said was Putin’s “strategic failure” in Ukraine, which had isolated Moscow, weakened its economy, and exposed the weakness of its military

title: Britain’s defense chief, a contender to run NATO, lays out his vision
description: In an interview, British Defense Secretary Ben Wallace says the alliance must press its members to spend more on defense if Russia is to remain contained.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Zelensky reprimands officials after civilians locked out of shelter were killed
description: Zelensky’s remarks came before Russia launched aerial attacks across Ukraine early Friday. There have been at least six attacks on Kyiv in the past six days.

title: To liberate territory, Ukraine must smash fortified Russian defenses
description: Ukrainian troops are removing some of their own land mines to create pathways into occupied territory where they will confront Russian fortifications.
